paragraphs: I am a results-driven marketing professional with a unique blend of brand management, operations optimization, and data analytics expertise. My journey spans from leading product development for global FMCG giants like Hindustan Unilever to implementing enterprise-wide digital transformation initiatives.

Currently pursuing my MSc in Marketing Management at EDHEC Business School in France, I bring hands-on experience from managing marketing campaigns, driving customer satisfaction to 90%, and leading cross-functional teams of 350+ employees.

My time at Ernst & Young honed my analytical skills and global perspective, where I served as the primary liaison for US SEC clients and was recognized with the Social Impact Champion Award for exceptional proactivity and community engagement.
